mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NUM, C.BOARD_CGY_TXT, B.USER_ID, M.USER_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_TXT, B.BOARD_TAG, B.COMMENT_YN, B.BOARD_VIEWCNT, DATE_FORMAT(B.BOARD_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON B.BOARD_CGY_NUM = C.BOARD_CGY_NUM LEFT JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.USER_ID = M.USER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_NUM = #{bnum};

mapper.select: SELECT TBF.BOARD_FILE_IDX AS BOARD_FILE_IDX, TBF.BOARD_NUM AS BOARD_NUM, TBF.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID, TBF.USE_YN AS USE_YN, TF.ORIG_NM AS ORIG_NM, TF.LOGI_PATH AS LOGI_PATH, TF.EXT AS EXT FROM TB_BOARD_FILE TBF LEFT JOIN TB_FILE TF ON TBF.FILE_ID = TF.FILE_ID WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND TBF.BOARD_NUM = #{bnum};
